title: [Brokkrsten's General Store]
[Brokkrsten's Armory]
[Brokkrsten's Magic Shoppe]
[Brokkrsten's Combat Gear]
[Brokkrsten's Weaponry]
description: Beneath an oak beam ceiling, a tattered merchant permit hangs on one of the honey gold oak walls.  A plain wooden table sits in one corner while a worn rug rests on the oak floor.

Honey gold oak walls rise from a polished oak floor.  Just above a stuffed grizzly bear hangs a square mithril-framed window, and an oak beam ceiling completes the picture.  A gilded maple cabinet and a heavy white granite counter stand side by side in the middle of the room.
